description.HeavyTailedAR1: AR(1) process with Student-t noise (fat-tailed outliers)
description.RegimeSwitching: Mean shifts based on hidden Markov state
description.TrendBreaks: Linear trend with abrupt slope changes
description.RandomWalk: Non-stationary process with no mean reversion
description.SeasonTrendOutliers: Sinusoidal wave with trend and sparse outliers
